name: Frichen
description:
Frichen is a unique 2D platform game with cartoon graphics. You are a chicken, you love fried chicken and you have to find your friend, a penguin. Run, jump, fly, shoot eggs like a weapon, hatch explosive eggs like a bomb, or call reinforcements if you are in trouble. All that while you are trying to pick up fried chickens to go to the store and make yourself pretty.
-56 levels to win
- 3 different attacks
-More than 15 enemies and traps to pass
-3 different worlds
-A store to buy things and make yourself pretty
-Just watch ads if you want

Warning: this is not an easy game, sometimes you have to be smart, sometimes you have to be skillful to win, and sometimes you have to be lucky, if you are looking for an easy game, this is not your game

Game made with Godot Engine
